languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Атаки в ближнем бою{/g} наносят {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненный урон{/g}. Цели выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −50 и в случае провала получают {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Melee attacks{/g} deal {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} and inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, unless the target passes an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}会造成{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}，并使目标{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。目标需要通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}才能消除燃烧状态，但此次检定会承受−50{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。

{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}会造成{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}，并使目标{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。目标需要通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}才能消除燃烧状态，但此次检定会承受−50{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}を与え、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}させる。ターゲットが−50の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功すれば避けることができる。

languages.text: Los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} infligen {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño de fuego{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}, a menos que el objetivo supere una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −50.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} verursachen 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, es sei denn, das Ziel besteht eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −50.

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} infligent des {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} et l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, sauf si la cible réussit un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −50.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Yakın dövüş saldırıları{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarı{/g} verir ve hedef, −50 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçemezse {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanmaya{/g} maruz kalır. Bu etki 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
